1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"I used to eat the meat from a bone when I was menstruating, then the Messenger of Allah would take it and put his mouth where my mouth had been. And I would drink from a vessel, and the Messenger of Allah would take it and put his mouth where my mouth had been, and I was menstruating

chapter.ara-name: باب ما جاء في مؤاكلة الحائض وسؤرها
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning eating with a menstruating woman and her leftovers
